Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Reproductive System Disorder/Female Reproductive System Disorder/Placenta Disorder/Placental Non-Neoplastic Disorder/Placenta Previa
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Abnormal placentation in which the PLACENTA implants in the lower segment of the UTERUS (the zone of dilation) and may cover part or all of the opening of the CERVIX. It is often associated with serious antepartum bleeding and PREMATURE LABOR.
A condition in which the placenta is implanted in the lower part of the uterus. --2003
